p: The George J.C. Thomas Sheriff of Walla Walla County, Washington Territory to the writ of Habeas Corpus answered

In obedience to the writ of Habeas Corpus hereto command & certify and whereto the S.G. Winegard Judge of the First Judicial District Washington Territory that before the coming of said writ to me on the 29th day of March 1876 at Walla Walla Washington Territory the said Mary A O'Neil mentioned in said writ was placed in my custody by virtue of a Commitment of said Judicial Court by one of the Justice of the Peace in and for Walla Walla County under my Sentence of said Court for being a Habitual drunkard and disorderly person and ordinance to the Committee to the County Jail of Walla Walla County for the of the should give bond in the sum of one hundred dollars whereinand that the said Mary A. O'Neil is is now in my custody by under of said Commitment in
of which is and which I certify and I hearthey this before the said S.G. 'Judge' as by the said writ I have Commanded
and of Walla Walla Co being served and says that the within is true as I verily believe.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 5 April 1876.
